short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PESU Attendance Extension developed for PES University students.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension works like If there is a lack of attendance, it will be highlighted and displayed how many classes must be taken to make up for the lack of attendance.

Features
 • Subject Shortage will be highlighted.
 • Reflects how many classes a student needs to attend.
 • Average percentage setup can be made accordingly.

New Features
 • UI updated.
 • Find out how many classes you can bunk.
 • Get a report on your attendance.
